*Manuf P/N: GA00781-NO • [https://www.techinsights.com/products/bom-1910-819 BoM] *CPU: [[Synaptics]] [https://www.techinsights.com/products/dfr-1912-802 AS370] ([https://www.synaptics.com/company/news/AS3xx ''AudioSmart'']) :@1.4GHz (Quad Core ARM Cortex-A53)
{{FCC ST|03/08/2020}}
*[https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Google+Nest+Mini+(2nd+generation)+Teardown/130974 ''Google Nest Mini (2nd Gen)'' Teardown on '''iFixit'''] :CPU: [[Synaptics]] AS370 A1 (BG6CDZ1F) :Flash: [[Toshiba]] TC58NVG2S0H :RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5CC128M16JR-EK
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[https://9to5google.com/2019/08/21/exclusive-google-nest-mini-2nd-gen/ ''Exclusive: Google plans second-gen Nest Mini'' on '''9to5Google'''] :w/ built-in wall mount, better sound, aux jack *[https://www.techradar.com/news/google-home-mini-2-release-date-news-and-rumors ''Google Nest Mini release date and price'' on '''TechRadar''']
===Models=== :;[[Google Devices]] • [[List of Wireless Speaker Systems]] *[[Google Home (H0ME)]] • [https://www.engadget.com/2016/11/03/google-home-review/ Engadget] • [https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Google+Home+Teardown/72684 iFixit] *[[Google Home Max (H0B)]] • [https://www.engadget.com/2017/12/19/google-home-max-review/ Engadget] • [https://www.techinsights.com/products/bom-1804-827 BoM] *[[Google Home Mini (H0A)]] • [https://teardowns.abiresearch.com/teardowns/pe_googleteardown-home-mini-h0a-0/ ABI] • [https://medium.com/@justlv/google-home-mini-teardown-comparison-to-echo-dot-and-giving-technology-a-voice-c59a23724a26 Medium] *[[Google Home Hub (H1A)]] • (October 9, 2018) :[[Google Nest Hub]] (H1A) • (October 9, 2018) :FCC ID: A4RH1A (2018-09-20) • [https://www.techinsights.com/products/bom-1810-814 BoM] *[[Google Nest Hub Max (H2A)]] • (May 7, 2019) :FCC ID: A4RH2A (2019-05-07) • [https://www.techinsights.com/products/bom-1909-802 BoM] *[[Google Nest Mini (H2C)]] • (October 22, 2019) :FCC ID: A4R-H2C (2019-09-10) • [https://www.techinsights.com/products/bom-1910-819 BoM] *[[Google Nest WiFi Router (H2D)]] (2nd Gen) • (October 15, 2019) :FCC ID: A4R-H2D (2019-09-30) • [https://www.techinsights.com/products/bom-1911-809 BoM] • [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07YMKD6SM Amazon] • [https://support.google.com/googlenest/answer/6280668 Spec.] :[[Qualcomm]] QCS404 - Wi-Fi 6/BT 5.1/ZigBee • [https://www.techinsights.com/products/bfr-2001-805 WiSoC] <!-- :a. A wireless combo SoC for the smart speakers. :b. Torn down from the Google Nest Wi-Fi Router. :c. Supports Bluetooth 5.1, Wi-Fi 6, ZigBee. --> *[[Google Nest WiFi Point (H2E)]] (2nd Gen) • [https://support.google.com/googlenest/answer/6280668 Spec.] :FCC ID: A4R-H2E (2019-09-30) • [https://www.techinsights.com/products/bom-1911-810 BoM] *[[Google Coral (AA1)]] (Plug Computer) • [https://www.techinsights.com/products/bom-2002-812 BoM] *[[Google Stadia (H2B)]] (Game Controller) • [https://www.techinsights.com/products/bom-1911-812 BoM] :FCC ID: A4RH2B (2019-05-31) • ''Google Stadia'' Gamepad ([https://www.droid-life.com/2019/05/31/new-google-home-device-stops-at-fcc-but-what-the-hell-is-it/ DL]) :CPU: [[NXP]] MIMXRT1061, Wi-Fi: BCM43458, FL: GD25LQ128DWIG
